docs.snippet: THE PRINCE MOORAGAKE AGAIN DELINEATES THE SENTIMENTS OF HIS SOUL TO HIS JEDDO CORRESPONDENT, AND REJOICES IN HAVING SAFELY PASSED THROUGH JERSEY-MOORAGAKE ALLUDES BRIEFLY TO THE RECEPTION OF THE EMBASSY IN THIS CITY, BUT DISCOURSES MORE AT LENGTH...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE PRINCE MOORAGAKE AGAIN DELINEATES THE SENTIMENTS OF HIS SOUL TO HIS JEDDO CORRESPONDENT, AND REJOICES IN HAVING SAFELY PASSED THROUGH JERSEY-MOORAGAKE ALLUDES BRIEFLY TO THE RECEPTION OF THE EMBASSY IN THIS CITY, BUT DISCOURSES MORE AT LENGTH UPON LESS COSTLY COURTRSIES MOORAGAKE IS BECOMING SOMEWHAT RECONCILED TO AMERICAN MANNERS.

docs.snippet: Steamship De Soto, JAS. D. BULLOCH, Commander, arrived yesterday morning from New Orleans, via Havana, with moderate freight, and a large passenger list to LIVINGSTON, CROCHERON  Co.

headline.main: From Havana.; NEGROES LANDED--A CARGO CAPTURED--THE SUGAR MARKET.

docs.lead_paragraph: Steamship De Soto, JAS. D. BULLOCH, Commander, arrived yesterday morning from New Orleans, via Havana, with moderate freight, and a large passenger list to LIVINGSTON, CROCHERON Co.

docs.snippet: The twenty-seventh anniversary of the formation of the City Guard was celebrated yesterday by an excursion to Long Branch, and a dinner at the National Hotel. It being the occasion of the opening of the Raritan and Delaware Bay Railroad, to Long...

headline.main: Anniversary of the City Guard.; EXCURSION TO LONG BRANCH OPENING OF THE RARITAN AND DELAWARE BAY RAILROAD DINNER, SPEECHES, ETC.

docs.lead_paragraph: The twenty-seventh anniversary of the formation of the City Guard was celebrated yesterday by an excursion to Long Branch, and a dinner at the National Hotel. It being the occasion of the opening of the Raritan and Delaware Bay Railroad, to Long Branch, the City Guard accepted the invitation of the Railroad Company to pass over their road and join in the opening celebration at the same time that they celebrated their own anniversary.

docs.snippet: There is no likelihood of the adoption of the Japanese costume in this country. However baggy the fashion of trowsers may become, it will still fall far short of the amplitude of a Kami's toiski, and let the rage for a sensation " tile" run

headline.main: Retirement of Senator Yulee.; The following is the letter of Senator YULEE, declining a reelection to the Senate:

docs.snippet: The Board of Aldermen had their regular meeting yesterday, but in view of the fact that the Japanese were waiting for the Committee, or the Committee for the Japanese, the meeting was not remarkably harmonious.

headline.main: BOARD OF ALDERMEN.; PAVING OF GREENWICH-STREET LAID OVER $7,000 APPROPRIATED FOR FOURTH OF JULY BATTERY ENLARGEMENT AND GEORGE LAW'S FERRY LEASE PASSED.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Board of Aldermen had their regular meeting yesterday, but in view of the fact that the Japanese were waiting for the Committee, or the Committee for the Japanese, the meeting was not remarkably harmonious.

docs.snippet: COMMON COUNCIL THE CORRUPTION FUND AGAIN THE JAPANESE EMBASSY THE NATIONAL ANNIVERSARY BOARD OF HEALTH. At a regular meeting of the Board of Aldermen last evening, a resolution was adopted, directing a Committee to make the necessary arrangements to...
docs.lead_paragraph: COMMON COUNCIL THE CORRUPTION FUND AGAIN THE JAPANESE EMBASSY THE NATIONAL ANNIVERSARY BOARD OF HEALTH. At a regular meeting of the Board of Aldermen last evening, a resolution was adopted, directing a Committee to make the necessary arrangements to spend the $1,000 annually appropriated for celebrating the National Anniversary. The following resolution was adopted.

headline.main: From Havana. ANOTHER QUICK PASSAGE STATE OF THE SUGAR MARKET.
